discourse_list.title: Security Tokens: Where are we today?

content.content: It looks like I may be branching into security tokens. I see that a large part of the conversation seems to have happened here on the Magicians Discourse, especially @boris @expede @AdamDossa. I’m having trouble figuring out where to jump in, and where things are holding, though. ERC-1400 (/ERC-1410 and ERC-1411) seem to have the most ‘attention’ from what I see, and I see that they’re merged for review, but how volatile is that standard? I see a number of other offerings, and some uncertainties about how to best codify certain regulatory issues. I’m playing catch-up with the threads here and in GitHub, but if there’s anything else I should be doing, I’d love the tip.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is seeking guidance on where to start with security tokens and is asking for advice on the best way to approach the topic. They mention that ERC-1400 seems to have the most attention, but they are unsure about the volatility of the standard. The post is a request for help and advice, and the author is seeking feedback and constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Brooke and I worked on this problem at a previous company and FISSION Codes can be used for some of the message flows. Adam is your guy to get in touch with. There’s a Telegram channel and more. There are a bunch of other efforts that all came out of the woodwork at the same time. Right now it looks like there will be multiple “standards”. For application layer stuff like this — it’s all about adoption.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Hey @wscwab, A lot of the general discussion is happening on Telegram at the moment:    Telegram    ERC 1400 Alliance Discussion on ERC 1400 - Security Token Standard - https://t.me/joinchat/FVjP7kY7D6EUX6GYsCEi1w       re. ERC-1400/1410 there has been a lot of discussion here, on GitHub, at the Token Ring pre-DevCon and on some community calls - it’s on my plate to summarise this which I’m hoping to get out in the next couple of days, which includes updating the ERC in-line with those discussions. Thanks, Adam

content.content: I need to check out this Telegram thread! We have been generating a lot of interest around ERC 1450 (security tokens for Regulations CF, A+, and D). Here are the highlights:  StartEngine Develops ERC-1450 protocol, While Hosting STO ERC-1450, New Token Standard Announced For Digital Stock Certificates On Ethereum Blockchain
